topic: Colors: 赤, 青, 緑, 黄
detailedSummary: Basic colors in Japanese: aka (red), ao (blue), midori (green), kiiro (yellow), kuro (black), shiro (white), hai iro (gray), cha iro (brown), orenji (orange), pinku (pink).
whyItMatters: Mastering Colors: 赤, 青, 緑, 黄 is essential for building a strong foundation in japanese - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
